data.comment: The big names in today's match at Willem II Stadion have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Tilburg.
In the minute 8, Jordens Peters for Willem II has been booked by Allard Lindhout and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Vangelis Pavlidis.
Sebastian Holmen with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Goal! Ridgeciano Haps equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Joao Carlos Teixeira instrumental with a fine assist.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Willem II Stadion.
Goal! Feyenoord have got their heads in front thanks to a Bryan Linssen strike.
Mats Kohlert is on a sub for Dries Saddiki for Willem II.
In the minute 56, Steven Berghuis puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
That's a fine assist from Joao Carlos Teixeira.
The home team replace John Yeboah with Ole Romeny.
In the minute 68, Willem II make their third substitution with Victor Van den Bogert replacing Vincent Schippers.
Goal! Steven Berghuis extends Feyenoord's lead to 1-4.
Orkun Kokcu is replacing Joao Carlos Teixeira for the away team.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Mark Diemers with Luciano Narsingh. This is the second substitution made today by Dick Advocaat.
Robert Bozenik is replacing Bryan Linssen for the away team.
Tyrell Malacia is replacing Ridgeciano Haps for Feyenoord at Willem II Stadion.
In the minute 88, Uros Spajic (Feyenoord) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Allard Lindhout blows to end the match. The final score is 1-4.
